text: Xenorhabdus koppenhoeferi is a bacterium from the genus of Xenorhabdus which has been isolated from the nematode Steinernema scarabaei in the United States.UniProtDeutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen == References == == Further reading == * * * ==External links== *Type strain of Xenorhabdus koppenhoeferi at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacteria described in 2006
title: Xenorhabdus koppenhoeferi
